altTitles.ja: 遺産彼氏。-今日からあなたは私のもの-

altTitles.ja-ro: Isan Kareshi: Kyouko kara Anata wa Watashi no Mono
Isan Kareshi: Kyou kara Anata wa Watashi no Mono

altTitles.en: Inherited Boyfriend: From Now on, You're Mine
Legacy Darling: From Now on You Are Mine

description.en:
"In accordance with Lady Murasaki Sakurada's will, her fortune and myself belong to you now."

A man saves Ritsu from being hit by a car. He's beautiful, with hair as white as snow, but he's claiming that he belongs to her now! The man, Ren, blithely explains that he's come to the orphaned Ritsu in accordance with the will left behind by Ritsu's great-grandmother. Ritsu is shocked and confused, but the man seems nice enough... And his fingers and gaze seem to seek her almost madly...
description.es: “De acuerdo con la voluntad de la señora Murasaki Sakurada, su fortuna y yo te pertenecemos desde ahora.” Un hombre salva a Ritsu de ser atropellada por un coche. Es muy guapo y su pelo es blanco como la nieve, ¡pero hora él dice que le pertenece a ella! Ren, le explica alegremente a la huérfana Ritsu que la ha buscado siguiendo la voluntad de su bisabuela. Ritsu se siente conmocionada y confundida, el hombre es bastante atractivo... y sus dedos y su mirada parecen buscarla desesperadamente.
